title: Summer Romance
description: Ordinary 16 year old Deanna Lansford was prepared for another boring summer with her parents on Leech Lake, but things soon changed when she met Eric Matthews.Her life revolved around reading paranormal romances, but never did she dream of actually meeting a wolf shape shifter, and not to mention one so hot.Deann knows she must keep Eric's secret from her parents, but she soon discovers a secret of her own that may cost Eric his life.
author: Traci Mitchell
